User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap
Sitemap: https://focusbox.dev/sitemap.xml

# Crawl-delay for respectful crawling
Crawl-delay: 1

# Disallow crawling of build artifacts and development files
Disallow: /dist/
Disallow: /node_modules/
Disallow: /*.json$
Disallow: /src/
Disallow: /.git/
Disallow: /wrangler.toml
Disallow: /vite.config.js
Disallow: /package*.json
Disallow: /CLAUDE.md
